name: Neo Night
description:
Okay, while this was submitted, we're having last-second issues with it, so it's kind of broken. Please be aware. I'll be the first to say that I don't recommend demoing this at the moment.

// Controls -->

Move - WASD

Fire Hook - Right Mouse

Cut Blocks - Left Mouse

Pick Up - S   (Down)

Rotate Block - Q and E

Throw - Right Mouse
